Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CChar2Tchar::CChar2Tchar ( const CHAR *  szString) [inline]

Converts Char 2 TChar

The constructor builds a buffer (if necessary) to contain the string after all the escape sequences for tabs/newlines have been removed.

Parameters:
szStringis the string to unescape.
tcEscapeis the escape character.
